mapper.select: SELECT real_name FROM sys_mobile_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.id, c.COM_NAME AS CODE, redline_id, content, number, proof_lon, proof_lat, longitude, latitude, type, create_date, create_by, save_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, verify_by, verify_date, b.srld_number AS redlineName, c.COM_NAME AS placeName, d.real_name AS createUser, e.real_name AS verifyUser FROM lm_board a LEFT JOIN data_redline_register b ON a.redline_id = b.srld_id LEFT JOIN sys_company c ON a.`code` = c.COM_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user d ON a.create_by = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user e ON a.verify_by = e.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 1 AND a.type = 0
and a.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%')
and a.number like concat('%', #{param}, '%')

SELECT a.id, redline_num, redline_id, content, a.code, number, proof_lon, proof_lat, longitude, latitude, type, verify_person as verifyPerson, create_date, create_by, save_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, verify_by, verify_date as verifyDate, b.srld_number AS redlineName, c.COM_NAME AS placeName, d.real_name AS createUser, e.real_name AS verifyUser FROM lm_board a LEFT JOIN data_redline_register b ON a.redline_id = b.srld_id LEFT JOIN sys_company c ON a.`code` = c.COM_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user d ON a.create_by = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user e ON a.verify_by = e.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 1 AND a.type = 1
and a.code like concat( #{code}, '%')
and (b.srld_name=#{param} or a.number = #{param})
mapper.update: update lm_board set del_flag = 0 where type = 0
